content: the court of arezzo has made a final ruling on a claim brought by several parties regarding the dissolution of a community property the court has assigned ownership of the real estate portions to the coowners and determined the value of the entire property to be €345000 one group of heirs is entitled to €230000 the court has ordered the payment of balances to the coowners and the release of the property within 60 days failure to comply will result in a daily fine the judgment is enforceable by law
